column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: house. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix ex: <http://example.org/house#> .ex:House rdf:type rdfs:Class .ex:floors rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ex:House ;    rdfs:range rdfs:Literal .ex:rooms rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ex:House ;    rdfs:range rdfs:Literal .ex:address rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ex:House ;    rdfs:range rdfs:Literal .ex:isForSale rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ex:House ;    rdfs:range rdf:Literal .ex:price rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ex:House ;    rdfs:range rdfs:Literal .ex:primaryOwner rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:domain ex:House ;    rdfs:range ex:Person .ex:Person rdf:type rdfs:Class .```
